enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Sequence End Interrupt is not asserted

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Network Address Match Interrupt is not asserted

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Network Address Match Interrupt is asserted

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Timer1 (T1) Compare Interrupt is not asserted

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Timer2 (T2) Compare Interrupt is not asserted

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: PLL Unlock Interrupt is not asserted

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: RX Watermark Interrupt is not asserted

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: TSM0_IRQ and TSM1_IRQ are both clear

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Indicates TSM0_IRQ or TSM1_IRQ is set in XCVR_STATUS

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Sequence End Interrupt is not enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Network Address Match Interrupt is not enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Network Address Match Interrupt is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Timer1 (T1) Compare Interrupt is not enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Timer1 (T2) Compare Interrupt is not enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: PLL Unlock Interrupt is not enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: RX Watermark Interrupt is not enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: All GENERIC_FSK Interrupts can be enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: RX_IRQ will not be asserted for a received packet which fails CRC verification

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: RX_IRQ will be asserted even for a received packet which fails CRC verification

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: CRC of RX packet is not valid

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: CRC of RX packet is valid

enumeratedValue.name: 0x2
enumeratedValue.description: TX Start @ T1 Timer Compare Match (EVENT_TMR = T1_CMP)

enumeratedValue.name: 0x3
enumeratedValue.description: TX Start @ T2 Timer Compare Match (EVENT_TMR = T2_CMP)

enumeratedValue.name: 0x4
enumeratedValue.description: TX Cancel -- Cancels pending TX events but do not abort a TX-in-progress

enumeratedValue.name: 0x6
enumeratedValue.description: RX Start @ T1 Timer Compare Match (EVENT_TMR = T1_CMP)

enumeratedValue.name: 0x7
enumeratedValue.description: RX Start @ T2 Timer Compare Match (EVENT_TMR = T2_CMP)

enumeratedValue.name: 0x8
enumeratedValue.description: RX Stop @ T1 Timer Compare Match (EVENT_TMR = T1_CMP)

enumeratedValue.name: 0x9
enumeratedValue.description: RX Stop @ T2 Timer Compare Match (EVENT_TMR = T2_CMP)

enumeratedValue.name: 0xA
enumeratedValue.description: RX Cancel -- Cancels pending RX events but do not abort a RX-in-progress

enumeratedValue.name: 0xB
enumeratedValue.description: Abort All - Cancels all pending events and abort any sequence-in-progress

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: LQI is not yet valid for RX packet

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: LQI is valid for RX packet

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: CRC is not valid for RX packet

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: CRC is valid for RX packet

field.name: RSSI
field.description: Received Signal Stength Indicator, in dBm

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: do not manipulate input data stream

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: reflect each byte in the input stream bitwise

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: CRC result is to be reflected bitwise (operated on entire word)
start whitening at start-of-H1 but only if LENGTH > WHITEN_SZ_THR
start whitening at start-of-payload but only if LENGTH > WHITEN_SZ_THR

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Don't re-initialize Whitener LFSR at start-of-payload

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Manchester coding as per 802.3 but with the encoding signal inverted

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: packets which fail H0, H1, or LENGTH_MAX result in an automatic recycle after the header is received and parsed

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: packets which fail H0, H1, or LENGTH_MAX are received in their entirety
